messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Barney, was still waiting
messages.msgSnippet: Barney gives me the shudders - I just find him icky.  My children found out I don t like Barney and now they delight in rushing over to warn me that he s on.
messages.messageBody:
Barney gives me the shudders - I just find him icky. My children found out
I don't like Barney and now they delight in rushing over to "warn" me that
he's on.

I remember seeing some stuff on the "I Hate Barney" fan club. Their motto
was "Your children don't have to know."

On 12/10/05, Leslie530@... <Leslie530@...> wrote:
>
>
> In a message dated 12/10/2005 1:38:56 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
> krisula@... writes:
>
> One day she was talking about a
> Barney episode and I told her I hadn't seen it. "why not?. "because I
> don't
> watch Barney" "why not?" Well, I don't like Barney." (I meant the show)
> She got a really serious face and said very sweetly. "Well,
> Barney likes
> you."
>
> Oops
>
> krisula
>
>
>
>
> **************
>
> LOL!!! There's something about that Barney. My daughter said once "mom,
> when you say God is Love do you mean like Barney? Barney is all about
> love,
> too."
>
> Leslie in SC

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Barney, was still waiting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/2005 3:01:40 PM Eastern Standard Time, Leslie530@aol.com writes: LOL!!!  There s something about that Barney.  My daughter  said  once
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/2005 3:01:40 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Leslie530@... writes:

LOL!!! There's something about that Barney. My daughter said once "mom,
when you say God is Love do you mean like Barney? Barney is all about
love,
too."


~~~~~~~~~~
lol... thankfully, my kids never much cared for the purple one... or
Teletubbies... the other one that drove me nuts and the kids thought was "weird" was
the new "Boohbahs". They were a bit disturbing...

Jenny
Unschooling in Greenfield, MA
Danny (12-1-99), Kelsey (11-1-01) and Evelyn (5-19-04)
~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
The important thing is not so much that every child should be taught, as
that every child should be given the wish to learn. ~John Lubbock



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Barney, was still waiting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/2005 1:38:56 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, krisula@lemoncrab.com writes: One day  she was talking about a Barney episode and I told her
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/2005 1:38:56 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
krisula@... writes:

One day she was talking about a
Barney episode and I told her I hadn't seen it. "why not?. "because I don't
watch Barney" "why not?" Well, I don't like Barney." (I meant the show)
She got a really serious face and said very sweetly. "Well, Barney likes
you."

Oops

krisula




**************

LOL!!! There's something about that Barney. My daughter said once "mom,
when you say God is Love do you mean like Barney? Barney is all about love,
too."

Leslie in SC
